record.field: 1. What is the best social media platform for B2B industries to gain leads?
2. When your post on Instagram has 200 impressions and 100 reach, what does that mean?
A. Your post has been seen twice by users
B. 200 people have interacted with your post
D. Your post has been displayed 50 times
3. What type of engagement is weighed most heavily according to the Instagram algorithm?
4. Below are the functions of social media for B2B industries. Which one of them that is true?
5. What type of post tones down the social media engagement if it dominates the account?
C. Promos, features, and selling words
D. Education for audiences about the related fields
6. In creating social media campaign, we have to set SMART goals. What does SMART stand for?
A. Smart, Measurable, Active, Robust, Timely
B. Specific, Measurable, Active, Realistic, Time-sensitive
C. Smart, Managed, Achievable, Robust, Timely
D. Smarts, Measurable, Achievable, Realistic, Time-sensitive
7. In managing social media, we will work closely with these roles, except…
8. What is the best strategy to comply with Instagram that changes its feed order from chronological order to algorithm-based feed?
A. Post as frequently as we can
B. Provide the most relevant content to our audiences
D. Share the post until it has the desired reach
9. These are the best sources of impression Instagram that can reach new audiences, except…
10. What is the ideal number of hashtags used in a post to reach many people?
11. Below are the right strategies to find the best market on social media, except …
B. Review the social media insight
12. What is the right order of Instagram Followers Loop?
A. Reach non-followers - Share the Post - Profile visit - Follow
B. Post - Reach non-followers - Interaction - Profile visit - Follow
C. Profile visit - See the post - Interaction - Follow
D. Profile visit - Follow - See the Post - Interaction
13. Below are the important followers demographic on LinkedIn that should be watched when running a marketing campaign, except…
14. The number of unique users who see your post or page is the definition of…
15. Can hashtags on TikTok boost discovery and engagement?
D. Yes, but only for trending content only
16. What is the purpose of optimizing the social media profile?
A. To enhance the account’s visibility
17. How often should you post on social media?
B. At least once a day
D. As often as you can
18. What can you change to do A/B testing on social media?
19. What will you do if your content does not attract of engagement, but not much hash happened recently?
A. Stop posting at all while waiting for a good momentum
B. Post simple content and keep the flow
C. Stop mediocre content and invest time to create original and fresh content
D. Do some pollings to see what the audience want to see
20. You are reviewing the performance of the ads and it shows this data

blockquote.p:
Click: 25
Impression: 500
What is the CTR of the ads?

record.field: 21. Which one is not the three specific types of Facebook reach?
A. The individual interactions of your content such as reactions, comments, and shares.
B. How many unique people saw your content.
C. The number of views on a piece of content.
D. The number of views on a piece of content.
23. What is the right strategy to get to the Instagram explore page?
A. Post in the right time
B. Tag as many accounts as possible
D. Experiment with the type of content
24. If you see a former employee comment on your post and mention confidential data of the company on social media, what would you do?
C. Ask the employee to remove it
D. Leave if it’s not too sensitive
25. Generally, when is the worst time to post on Instagram?
26. What is the company that owns TikTok?
A. A free dashboard that social media marketers and content creators can use to manage Facebook Page and Instagram accounts
B. A free dashboard to manage paid promotions
C. A free dashboard to see hashtags performance
D. A tool to spy on competitor’s social media performance
28. Reels discovery despends on the sounds used. Is the statement correct?
C. Correct but depends on the content relevancy
D. Correct but depends on the hashtags used
29. In a ERP company's social media, what is the type of content taht might not work well?
30. What is the limit of accounts to interact with per day before Instagram considers it as spam or inorganic engagement?
